## Part 1

```{r}
dt |>
  mutate(
    xx = paste0(x, x),
    xy = paste0(x, y),
    xz = paste0(x, z),
    yy = paste0(y, y),
    yz = paste0(y, z),
    zz = paste0(z, z)
  ) |>
  select(-"xx", -"yy", -"zz") |>
  pivot_longer(cols = c("xy", "xz", "yz")) |>
  group_by(name) |>
  mutate(
    minX = min(x), maxX = max(x),
    minY = min(y), maxY = max(y),
    minZ = min(z), maxZ = max(z)
  ) |>
  # pull(value) |>
  unique() |>
  length()

# (nrow(dt) * 6) - x + 1
```
